channel.title: Posts on Dexter's Personal Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Dexter's Personal Site

item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is the first post! I’m not sure yet what I’m going to do with this space but my first instict is to start using it as a place to write some tutorials so that I can remind my future self of all the little tips and tricks I’ve learned.
item.content: This is the first post! I’m not sure yet what I’m going to do with this space but my first instict is to start using it as a place to write some tutorials so that I can remind my future self of all the little tips and tricks I’ve learned.
